scripts.bundle: rm node_modules/purescript/purs.bin && cp $(which purs) node_modules/purescript && mv node_modules/purescript/purs node_modules/purescript/purs.bin && spago build && cp -r src/App/Api/Foreign output/App.Api.Endpoints && node esbuild.mjs
scripts.generate_api: node api_updater.mjs && rm -rf src/App/Api/Foreign/* && openapi-generator-cli generate -i api.json -g javascript -o src/App/Api/Foreign --additional-properties=usePromises=true,emitModelMethods=true
